# path

**Instance Property**

An array of coordinate objects representing the path of the route segment.

## Declaration

```swift
path?: Coordinate[];
```

## Discussion

An array of [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Coordinate] objects that traces the route segment. To render the route segment on a map, set the [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/PolylineOverlay/points] property of [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/PolylineOverlay] to this array.
title: path
